This is a re-release of[setuptools-git-version][] with fixes and improvements.[setuptools-git-version]: https://github.com/pyfidelity/setuptools-git-version## IntroductionInstead of hard-coding the package version in ``setup.py`` like:```pythonsetup( name='foobar', version='1.0', ...)```this package allows to extract it from the underlying Git repository:```pythonsetup( name='foobar', version_format='{tag}.dev{commits}+{sha}', setup_requires=['very-good-setuptools-git-version'], ...)```
